title.rendered: For more diversity in the legal profession

content.rendered: An editorial in the Globe and Mail on the need for greater diversity in the legal profession and judiciary mentions LAWS as part of the intiative to improve representation.

excerpt.rendered: An editorial in the Globe and Mail on the need for greater diversity in the legal profession and judiciary mentions LAWS as part of the intiative to improve representation.
